attributes.action: Hold a Public Vote of No Confidence in the Administration of the United Kingdom
attributes.additional_details:
A straightforward vote of no confidence will address the current problems head on. The people do not trust this Government or the opposition. 
Parliament would need to unite to try and win the vote, & when they lose they must dissolve and a general election held in which both parties are prohibited from participating.
attributes.background:
Both government & opposition are the worst in recorded history.
Parliament is paralysed by party politics, ideology & voter disenfranchisement.
These are inevitable consequences of a political system that has broken down.
The electorate need to express their dissent & our politics must reform.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for Ministers to be sacked or for a vote of no confidence.

You may wish to sign this petition calling for a general election:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/314151

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or the House of Commons, you could start a petition about that.
